      • getAllTax

        public java.util.List<Tax> getAllTax()
                              throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                     DatabaseConnectionException
        Retrieves all tax records.
        Returns:
        A list of Tax objects representing all tax records.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs.
        DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.

      • getTaxById

        public Tax getTaxById(java.util.List<Tax> tax,
                      int tid)
               throws EmployeeNotFoundException
        Retrieves a tax record by its ID.
        Parameters:
        tax - The list of tax records to search in.
        tid - The tax record ID to search for.
        Returns:
        The Tax object representing the tax record with the given ID.
        Throws:
        EmployeeNotFoundException - If the tax record with the given ID is not found.

                       throws EmployeeNotFoundException,
                              java.sql.SQLException,
                              DatabaseConnectionException
        Retrieves a tax record by employee ID.
        Parameters:
        taxlist - The list of tax records to search in.
        eid - The employee ID to search for.
        Returns:
        The Tax object representing the tax record associated with the given employee ID.
        Throws:
        EmployeeNotFoundException - If the tax record for the employee with the given ID is not found.
        DatabaseConnectionException

        public Tax getTaxByYear(java.util.List<Tax> taxlist,
                        int year)
                 throws InvalidInputException,
                        java.sql.SQLException,
                        DatabaseConnectionException
        Retrieves a tax record by tax year.
        Parameters:
        taxlist - The list of tax records to search in.
        year - The tax year to search for.
        Returns:
        The Tax object representing the tax record for the given tax year.
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException - If the input tax year is invalid.
        java.sql.SQLException

      • calcualteTax

        public void calcualteTax(int eid,
                         java.lang.String yr)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException,
                         TaxCalculationException,
                         DatabaseConnectionException
        Calculates tax for an employee for the given year and updates the tax records.
        Parameters:
        eid - The employee ID for whom tax calculation is to be performed.
        yr - The tax year for which tax is to be calculated.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs.
        TaxCalculationException - If there is an error during tax calculation.
        DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.

      • calcualteTax1

        public double calcualteTax1(int eid,
                            java.lang.String yr)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException,
                            TaxCalculationException,
                            DatabaseConnectionException
        Calculates tax amount for an employee for the given year.
        Parameters:
        eid - The employee ID for whom tax amount is to be calculated.
        yr - The tax year for which tax amount is to be calculated.
        Returns:
        The calculated tax amount.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs.
        TaxCalculationException - If there is an error during tax calculation.
        DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.
